revised_title: Tribute to Mr. I. Kaye's Service as the Royal Society Librarian
tldr: This article pays tribute to Mr. I. Kaye's service as the Librarian of the Royal Society. He served for 24 years, re-cataloged the books and periodicals, arranged and classified the manuscript collections, and successfully organized the library's relocation. His contributions have greatly benefited the world of learning.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Librarianship
